mewani jaramarayak nokara, ekthara sadharana pramanayakata yam demala abhilashada laba gatha haki, eheth ee abhilasha, sinhala janayage ekama abhilashaya wana tamil naduwata eelam haraha lankawa alla gannata maga pada nodiya yuthuya yanna ha nogatena aakarayata diya haki baudddha madhyama prathipada (risanabal) wisandumak, eelam damanayak atha. 2009 mayi 19 data pasuda yuddha aagnyawak mangin ahosi kalayuthuwa thibu lankawe palath nawaye beduma ese sidunowuye rata gana, sinhala jathiya gana, bauddha shasanaya gana, hari haman kakkumak nomathi kalu suddan pirisak, dharmapalathumata pasuwa mathakadi gangodawila soma hamuduruwan wisinda itha pahadiliwa penwadun aakaraye, winashakari balawega walata goduruwi sitiya nisaya.
